description: Variation of Condition No. 4 of Planning Permission ref: P0547.13 dated 19/07/2013 to allow for the hours of Unit 4 to be adjusted to 7:30am to 9pm Monday to Friday, 8am to 7pm on Saturdays, and 10am to 4pm on Sundays, Bank and Public Holidays, and permit a maximum of one delivery at any time per 24 hour period. (Change of use to allow B1(b)(c), B2 & B8 activity)
decision_conditions: The proposal by reason of an unacceptable degree of noise and disturbance associated with the activities of the use when the background noise level would be particularly low and the local residents could be expected to enjoy their amenity without unreasonable levels of noise and disturbance late in the evening and early in the morning, as such the proposals would result in a significant detrimental impact upon the amenities of occupiers of adjacent properties contrary to Policies 7 and 34 of the Havering Local Plan.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent of the applicant on 21st March 2023.
